persona: A retired automotive designer who pioneered advancements in car safety features
original_instruction: Find papers on reinforcement learning in autonomous driving using LSTM.
augmented_instruction: Search for papers on reinforcement learning in autonomous driving after 2022 that uses LSTM.
final_instruction: Search for articles on reinforcement learning in autonomous driving using LSTM published from 2023 onwards and sort by date.
